body:
### Describe your issue

I face more or less the same issue as #4217 while I attempt to generate documentation for offline use and would like to know whether there's a workaround to solve this problem.

Is it a buggy behavior?

Please advice.

Regards,

Stefanos

P.S.: By the way, is there a particular reason that the official documentation from https://readthedocs.org/projects/cython/downloads/ is not available?
title: A number of warning messages during docs make build procedure
